definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: twist (NH Pi. and deriv.; Ar. fatala; Eth. fatala:; Aram. [[פְּתַל]], chiefly deriv., in fig. senses; Syr. ptal);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[נִפְּתַּלְתִּי עִם]] Ge 30:8 I have wrestled (lit. twisted myself) with; Pt. [[נִפְתָּלִים]] Job 5:13 the plan of the tortuous; [[וְעִקֵּשׁ]] Pr 8:8 anything tortuous and twisted.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[עִם־]] [[קְִֵּשׁ תִּתְפַּתָָּל]] Ps 18:27 with the twisted thou dost deal tortuously= 2Sa 22:27 (so rd. for imposs. [[תִּתַּפָָּל]]).
